      • SetupController

        public SetupController(SetupView view,
                       GuiEnvironment model)
        Initialises the controller and sets itself as the ActionListener for the view
        Parameters:

        model - The GuiEnvironment object which stores the game data

    • Method Detail

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)

        Parameters:
        e - The action performed

      • newPlayerPrompt

        private void newPlayerPrompt()
        Checks the name the player has entered and warns them if it is empty or not unique. Otherwise it creates a player object and adds it to the model. It adds a new pet panel and displays it.

      • newPetPrompt

        private void newPetPrompt()
        Checks the name the player has entered and warns them if it is empty or not unique, otherwise creates a pet object for them and adds it to the model. If the player has more pets to create, it adds a pet card and displays the next card. Otherwise it checks if there are more players to initialise and adds a newPlayer panel and displays it. Otherwise launches the main GUI window

      • newPet

        private Pet newPet(java.lang.String petSpecies,
                   java.lang.String petName,
                   Player player)
        Takes a species, name and player and returns a corresponding pet object
        Parameters:
        petSpecies - The desired species of the pet
        petName - The new pet's name
        player - The owner of the pet
        Returns:
        the pet being created.
